title: Fps drop after patch
body:
Anybody got the same issue? After the recent patch , i started getting insane fps drop in this game , i start with 200 fps and then i get down to 50 and in fights i get 20 ...
My system specs 
Gtx 1050 ti 
i5 7500
8 gb ram

i can run most games like bf 1 , ac syndicate , quantum break with ultra- high with 50+ fps but what the hell wrongs with lol?? I don't think it's drivers issue since all the other games are running smoothly

replies.body: Nothing works , i re installed the drivers but still i got nothing , same fps drops from 200 to 40 and then to 20 (yesterday i had 1 fps)

If you haven't yet, make sure you check for those driver updates. It's better to cover all your bases just to be safe and make sure we don't miss any of the simple fixes. If drivers don't seem to be the main problem, go ahead and check out the other steps in the [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) for the other basics.
